name: Rooty Tooty Mexican Shooty
description: Yelapa, Mexico has a long history as a quiet, refined fishing town, known for its tranquil beach and predictable weather. You play as the Mexican Man, a lone survivor of the fish swarm that ravaged this small town. Shoot your way through the hoard with your trusty revolvers and protect the only lasting piece of Yelapa history, the town shrine. Last as long as you can in this unwinnable, humanoid fish/Mexican themed swarm game, you won't be disappointed......  well maybe a little.
